name: Oathbreaker (Tystnex)
description:
You are coming back to your camp after searching for firewood in the forest. 
Shortly after you discover that not everything is as it should be and you spiral into hellish adventure with no end in sight. 

Made for Mini Jam 120. The game is still very much unpolished and quite far from what I wanted to accomplish, so expect some bugs and issues, sorry! Also I know it can be confusing but generally main goal of the player is to always find the axe to move forward.
